channel.title: HexChat "OFTC" Connectivity Problem
channel.description: Hello, I have a small problem with HexChat running on Whonix with the default settings in place. i get the below error whenever i try connect to OFTC Network. FYI .. I tried to build a new identity from tor-arm on Whonix-Gateway after closing the HexChat Stream, all with no luck ! Appreciating any insights .

item.description:

item.title: HexChat "OFTC" Connectivity Problem
item.dc:creator: delv3r
item.description:
Hello,
I have a small problem with HexChat running on Whonix with the default settings in place.
i get the below error whenever i try connect to OFTC Network.

<code

  • Capabilities acknowledged: multi-prefix
  • Closing Link: torrelay6.tomhek.net
    (No more connections permitted from your host) * Disconnected (Remote host closed socket)

    FYI â€¦ I tried to build a new identity from tor-arm on Whonix-Gateway after closing the HexChat Stream, all with no luck !

Appreciating any insights .

Read full topic
